html:
```html Your Custom Hair Loss Recovery Protocol

Your Personalized Hair Recovery Plan

Based on your survey responses, we’ve created a simple, effective plan designed to address the key factors behind your hair loss. This protocol balances proven hair health practices with strategies for stress management, restorative sleep, and nourishing nutrition. By following these steps consistently, you’ll create the ideal conditions for stronger, healthier regrowth.

  • Targeted Hair Practices: Daily scalp care and gentle routines to stimulate follicles while reducing breakage.
  • Stress Balance: Mindful techniques to calm the body and protect hair from stress-related shedding.
  • Sleep Support: Rest strategies to optimize your body’s natural repair and growth cycles.
  • Nutritional Guidance: A nourishing food approach to replenish the building blocks your hair most needs.

This protocol was tailored specifically around your lifestyle and current challenges, making it both realistic and impactful. Commit to these steps and watch your hair health steadily transform—your consistency today will shape the results you’ll see tomorrow.

```
